modName: UNP Patch for Various Guard outfits
summary: Unp Patch for Every city have various guard oufits TS Edition v1.2 by TS
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the female armor meshes of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6770]Varius Guard Outfits[/url] to adjust them to the Unp body shape.
The file only contains the appropriate armor meshes from exeters [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7305]Unp Female Armors[/url] with edited file and texture path, so the original Varius Guard Outfits mod is required.


[size=3][color=DarkOrange][b]Installation[/b][/color][/size]
Drop containend files into skyrim/data or use your favorite mod manager. Overwrite existing files.
[size=3][color=DarkOrange][b]Uninstallation[/b][/color][/size]
Delete files or uninstall with mod manager. Make sure original files from VariusGuardOutfits get restored.


[size=3][color=DarkOrange][b]Required[/b][/color][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6770]Every city have various guard oufits TS Edition v1.2[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]Unp Body v1.51[/url]


[size=3][color=DarkOrange][b]Credits[/b][/color][/size]
exeter - Unp Female Armors
dimon99 - Unp Body
nockchaa/TS - Every city have various guard oufits TS Edition
author: dren_yppah
